A little bit about me

In 2016 I decided it was time for a change. I knew I wanted a different career direction, but had no idea what that direction should be. I started researching. I looked at personality profiles, read job descriptions, talked to some wise friends and mentors, and in 2017 started a 6 month coding boot camp at GA Tech to learn web development. It was one of the most terrifying and exciting things I've ever done. I was trying to break into a highly technical career field in which I had no prior education or experience. It was a risk. Could this really work?

In the years to follow I've worked full time as a web-based software developer in Atlanta GA, developing custom software solutions for clients in the medical industry. I'd love to chat about your business goals and project needs, reach out to set up a call or video!
